body: : The sahuagin's tail elongates and melds with its legs. Its mouth enlarges, increasing its bite damage by one size category (to 1d6 for a typical sahuagin). Its swim speed increases by 20 feet, but its land speed is reduced to 5 feet. The sahuagin can't be tripped.
url: pfsrd://Monster Codex/Rules/Sahuagin/New Rules/Sahuagin Spells/Gift of the Deep/Shark-Blooded
name: Shark-Blooded
